entry.title: Arnett - Dresser
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Furniture
Price: 649.99

Melding modern and mid-century influences, the Arnett dresser brings a fashion-forward perspective to bedroom furniture. The dresser’s ultra clean lines—which include flush-mount drawers and bold, blocky feet—are beautified with a smoky gray finish that’s delightfully distinctive. Chunky bar pulls in a satin nickel-tone finish are a brilliant touch.

Product Features
  • Dresser only; mirror sold separately
  • Made of wood, engineered wood and engineered wood veneers
  • Smoky gray finish
  • Satin nickel-tone hardware
  • 6 smooth-gliding drawers
Dimensions:
Inches: 58" W x 16" D x 34" H

entry.title: Kanwyn - Dresser
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Furniture
Price: 1149.99

Give your retreat vintage charm and valuable drawer storage with this dresser. In a beautifully distressed whitewashed finish, you'll love putting it all away in casual style. Seven full-sized drawers and two accessory top drawers will easily accommodate your needs. Generously scaled moulding from top to bottom, along with bun feet and drawer handles with a transitional aesthetic, give this dresser character—invoking the feel of a quaint cottage escape.

Product Features
  • Made of solid wood, veneers and engineered wood
  • Distressed whitewashed finish
  • 7 smooth-gliding drawers, plus 2 small-scaled accessory drawers
  • Dark gray pewter-tone finished metal hardware
  • Dresser only; mirror sold separately
Dimensions:
Inches: 64.13" W x 18" D x 40.75" H

entry.title: Jorstad - Dresser & Mirror
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Furniture
Price: 699.99

This dresser is all about subtle detailing. Classic Louis Phillippe styling with gorgeous top moulding and scalloped-edge feet instantly grabs your attention. Light gray hue offers a clean and crisp appearance for a fresh spin on traditional design. Antiqued brass-tone knobs build visual contrast while making it easy for you to pull out the spacious drawers.

Product Features
  • Dresser with Mirror
  • Made of wood, engineered wood and veneers
  • 6 smooth-gliding drawers with dovetail construction
  • Knobs in antiqued brass-tone finish


About Jorstad
With a clean light gray finish flowing over the classic Louis Phillippe styling, the “Jorstad” bedroom collection flawlessly captures the essence of relaxed traditional design. The ogee shaped top moulding and bracket feet along with the upholstered panel sleigh headboard with a textural gray-white fabric adorned with nail head detailing creates a beautiful bedroom collection you’ll be proud to own.
